code:
def vertex_cover_approx(G):
    cover = set()
    edges = G.edges()

    while edges:
        max_edge = max(edges, key=lambda x: len(x))
        u, v = max_edge
        cover.add(u)
        cover.add(v)
        edges -= set(G.edges(u))
        edges -= set(G.edges(v))

    return cover
prompt: Vertex cover problem için approximation algoritması yaz.
